snippet: José Padilla, convicted in 2007 of supporting Al Qaeda and terrorism conspiracy, was sentenced Tuesday to 21 years in prison.
abstract: Jose Padilla, convicted in 2007 of supporting Al Qaeda and terrorism conspiracy, is sentenced to 21 years in prison after a federal appeals court ruled his original 17-year sentence was too lenient.
lead_paragraph: José Padilla, convicted in 2007 of supporting Al Qaeda and terrorism conspiracy, was sentenced Tuesday to 21 years in prison.

headline.main: Florida: New, Longer Sentence in Terrorism Case
headline.print_headline: Florida: New, Longer Sentence in Terrorism Case
